alert.note: Alert for Cuyahoga; Medina; Portage; Summit (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 3:10PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Portage, northeastern Medina, southeastern Cuyahoga and northern Summit Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 309 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Warrensville Heights to 6 miles southeast of Parma to North Royalton. Movement was southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Akron, Ravenna, Parma, Cuyahoga Falls, Strongsville, Brunswick, North Royalton, Kent, Solon, Hudson, Twinsburg, Tallmadge, Streetsboro, Warrensville Heights, Macedonia, Mogadore, Highland Hills, Mantua and Stow. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
